comment.author: 41675580@N08
comment._content: A lovely old black and white picture and great to see here, thank you for sharing.

comment.author: 62760997@N05
comment._content: I used to walk across London Bridge to work and look down onto Billingsgate Mardet with the porters carrying boxes of fish on top of specially designed hard hats with flat tops.  No - this was not when there were sail boats about - it was 1945.
